name: Action Boy/Girl
description: Your character knows how to make the most out of every moment. For each rank of this perk, the character gets an additional Action Point each combat turn.
effect: +1 AP each turn

name: Adrenaline Rush
description: You have a fear of death that allows you to fight harder when you are wounded. When your character's HP drop below 50% of their maximum, your character gains a +1 Strength bonus, but cannot go above the racial maximum.
effect: +1 STR when HP is below 50%

name: Animal Friend
description: Your character spends a lot of time with animals. A LOT of time. Animals will not attack one of their friends, unless the animal is threatened or attacked first.
effect: Wild animals will not attack you

name: Awareness
description: You know exactly what is going on in combat. This perk gives you more information when you examine a critter. You can see their exact number of hit points and the weapon they are armed with, if any.
effect: More information when examining a critter

name: Bend the Rules
description: With this perk, the next time your character gets to choose a perk, they can ignore all restrictions except for race. You rule!
effect: Next perk ignores all restrictions (except for race)

name: Better Criticals
description: Your shots somehow hurt more than usual. The critical hits you cause in combat are more devastating. When you do a critical hit that does not kill outright, your hit does 150% normal damage (in addition to any damage bonuses already gained). In addition, your chance to cause damage to a limb is increased by 50%. If you critically hit for 40 points of damage, for instance, you would instead deal a whopping 60 points. OUCH!.
effect: More devastating critical hits
requirement: Mutants cannot choose this perk. Perception 6, Luck 6,Agility 4, Level 9.

name: Bluff Master
description: You are the king or queen of smooth talking. Whenever you are caught stealing, your character can automatically talk his or her way out of the situation.
effect: Talk your way out of being caught stealing

name: Bone Head
description: You have a very thick skull, just like your mother always told you. With the first rank of this perk, you get a 50% chance to avoid being knocked unconscious. With the second rank, that chance increases to 75%.
effect: 50% chance to avoid being knocked unconscious, 75% at rank 2

name: Bonsai
description: Through careful nurturing, you have a small fruit tree growing out of your head. Now you have a steady supply of fruit!
effect: Fruits start growing in your head
requirement: Only Ghouls can choose this perk. Outdoorsman 50%, Science 40%, Level 12

name: Bonus HtH Attacks
description: Your character has watched Jackie Chan and Bruce Lee and managed to learn a thing or two. Your character can make more hand-to-hand or melee style attacks per combat turn with this perk. The AP cost to use a HtH or Melee attack is reduced by 1.
effect: Melee and Unarmed attacks cost -1 AP

name: Bonus HtH Damage
description: You have learned a special technique to deal more damage with your fists and melee weapons. Your character gains a +2 bonus to Melee Damage for each level of this perk.
effect: +2 MD for each rank

name: Bonus Move
description: You have learned to take longer strides in combat. For each level of this perk, your character can move 2 more hexes in combat. The first two hexes a character moves do no cost any APs.
effect: +2 AP for movement only

name: Bonus Ranged Damage
description: You know just where to hit to make it hurt more. Every bullet that successfully hits the target does +2 damage for each rank of this perk.
effect: +2 RNG damage for each rank

name: Bonus Rate of Fire
description: Your trigger finger is a little faster than normal. Each ranged weapon attack costs one less AP to perform.
effect: -1AP for RNG attacks

name: Bracing
description: You know how to brace large weapons while you are standing. When applicable, you get a bonus for using a tripod just by holding a weapon in your hands.
effect: Same bonus as tripod while holding weapons while standing

name: Break the Rules
description: When you choose this perk, you may choose any perk next time, regardless of requirements or race.
effect: Next time chose any perk (race doesnt matter)

name: Brown Noser
description: You’ve learned how to suck up to your superiors. You get +1 Charisma for reaction roles when dealing with authority figures for each rank of this perk.
effect: +1 CHA when dealing with authority figures

name: Cancerous Growth
description: The radiation has mutated you so badly that you thrive in the wastes. You gain a +2 bonus to your healing rate, and can regenerate a crippled limb in 48 hours.
effect: +2HR and regenerate crippled limbs in 48 hours
requirement: Only Ghouls can choose this perk. Strength < 7, Level 6

name: Cautious Nature
description: Your character has learned to be wary of the world around him. His Perception is increased by +3 when determining where he begins in random encounters.
effect: +3 PE to when determining random encounters

name: Comprehension
description: Looks like all those study skills courses paid off. With this perk, your character gains 50% to the number of skill points earned when reading educational books. Books that normally give you 10 skill points now give you 15.
effect: Extra bonus from reading books

name: Crazy Bomber
description: Your luck with explosives is legendary. Characters with this perk who fail to set an explosive properly will know immediately, and that explosive will not go off or detonate – it will be reset, so the Bomber can try again.
effect: Always knows when explosives fail to set and can reset them

name: Cult of Personality
description: Everybody likes your character. EVERYBODY. Instead of getting anegative modifier for the wrong kind of karma, you get a positive modifier. Bad people like good characters, and good people like bad characters. Good still likes good and bad still likes bad. Go figure.
effect: Reputation always affects people favorably

name: Demolition Expert
description: Your character has learned how to handle explosives like a pro. For characters that like to blow things up, there is nothing better than this perk. Explosives set by this character do 50% more damage and will always detonate on time.
effect: +50% explosive damage and explosives always detonate on time

name: Die Hard
description: You won’t go down without a fight! When your hit points drop below 20% of your maximum, you get an additional 10% Damage Resistance to all types of damage
effect: +When HP is below 20%, +10% DR to all damage types
